Title: 'Til the Day I Die
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Kyle Arrington, Marguerite MacIntyre, Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Klaus turns to Davina for help to learn more about a mysterious affliction affecting Hope. On their wedding day, Freya and Keelin make a tough decision about their future together, while ...
